item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

else if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && playerRights >= 3) {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(command.substring(7));
p.playerRights = 0;
p.savemoreinfo();
p.savechar();
p.disconnected = true;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (command.substring(7)
+ " is no longer a member of staff");
}

item.title: Can't get my ::demote command to work :( - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Leecher_Ian Leecher Ian
item.description:
@Leecher_Ian wrote:

    } else if (command.startsWith("demote") && playerRights >= 3) {
        String name = command.substring(7);

        try {
            int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 0;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name
                    + " is no longer a member of staff");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    } // lll

item.title: Can't get my ::demote command to work :( - PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Lumby_Ride Lumby Ride
item.description:
@Lumby_Ride wrote:

Heres the command anyone know the problem?

}else if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("R 4 P I D Z") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("S K 1 L L S") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Crysis")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; c.savemoreinfo(); c.savechar(); c.disconnected = true; sendMessage(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

It just says this isnt a players name or not online
